oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photoluminescent selenospirocyclic and selenotetracyclic derivatives by domino reactions of amines and imines
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, VP
SINGH, HB
BUTCHER, RJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: HIGHLY ENANTIOSELECTIVE CONSTRUCTION
RING CLOSING METATHESIS
SPIROCYCLIC COMPOUNDS
BETA-LACTAMS
CYCLOADDITION
SUBSTITUTION
SEQUENCE
ESTERS
ACIDS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Novel photoluminescent selenospirocyclic and selenotetracyclic compounds, stabilized by intramolecular secondary Se center dot center dot center dot O interactions with an ortho-nitro group, have been accessed successfully through domino reactions of amines and imines, respectively.
